page.title: 20Sport in Appleby
page.content: There are lots of sports facilities in Appleby,football,squash,bowls,cricket, badminton and swimming.The football club has four teams,Appleby firsts and seconds,under fourteens and under twelves.They play in four different leagues.The squash club has its own leagues with over thirty divisions. There are two courts in the building. The cricket club has three teams a first and second team and an under sixteen team.There are a few pub league games played on the field. There is a badminton court in the Centre 67.They play in the Penrith league.The swimming pool is an outdoor heated pool,it also has a swimming club.The bowling club has a lovely green it is very popular with the people in Applbey.The golf club is popular to visitors. Gary Bradley
